## Transmission Rate \beta

According to [WHO](https://www.who.int/news-room/fact-sheets/detail/measles#:~:text=For%20this%20reason%2C%20it%20is,days%20after%20the%20rash%20erupts.) one person can infect 9 out of 10 of their unvaccinated contacts

## Average contacts

| Age         | Average contact          |
|-------------|--------------------------|
| 0-5         | `r 69+71+3+27+16/5`      |
| 6-14        | `r 123 + 102+10+30+10/5` |
| 15-19       | `r (1+2+4+3+5)/5`        |
| 20-49       | `r (41+26+13+9+17)/5`    |
| >= 50 | `r (5+2+4+4+5)/5`        |

: Average number of contacts per age group[@kiti2016]
